Specs?

Xeon E5-1620 servers with 3x2TB SATA HDD in a RAID 1 config qua OpenVZ virtualization. The 3rd drive is reserved for daily backups. All plans come with 3 cores by default (more if you want), OVH's anti-DDoS mitigation, SolusVM and lots of OS to choose from.

Can I pay monthly?

Yep, it's $3.33 per month for every plan.

Addons?

Extra IPs are $12 / year.

Test IP/files?

192.99.214.79

Is X allowed?

See the Terms. Thanks for your interest.
